context: Hi, how are you? Did you enjoy your weekend?
HI, Im good how are you? I did. What about you?
Nice! I'm well. I enjoyed my weekend. I saw Deadpool 2 (2018) with my bf. Did you see it?
No! I do want to see it though, it looks funny.
Yeah, I liked the first one, Deadpool (2016) Did you see that one? If not, you definitely should watch it in order.
Yes I saw that one. Im a marvel fan are you? I saw Avengers: Infinity War (2018) that was great!
Nice! I am a Marvel fan, too! Have you watched Ant-Man (2015) ?
Im looking forward to seeing Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018) yep Ive seen that too!
resp: Yes! Me too! I wound up liking Ant-Man (2015) more than I thought I would!
